analysis: The document concerns the revocation and amendment of executive orders related to sanctions against Iran, specifically in relation to the Joint Comprehensive Plan of Action (JCPOA). It outlines the legal basis for the actions, details the specific executive orders being revoked or amended, and provides implementation authorities for sanctions outside the scope of the JCPOA. It also defines key terms and addresses potential issues such as evasion, conspiracy, and donations.
title: Iran Sanctions Easing under JCPOA
